title: Not able to install using conda forge
body:
Hi, I'm trying to install the shap library using the conda forge method as detailed in https://github.com/slundberg/shap but got the following error on Anaconda prompt:

(base) C:\Users\Emman>conda install -c conda-forge shap
Solving environment: failed

UnsatisfiableError: The following specifications were found to be in conflict:
  - anaconda==2018.12=py37_0 -> curl==7.63.0=h2a8f88b_1000 -> krb5[version='>=1.16.1,<1.17.0a0'] -> tk[version='>=8.6.7,<8.7.0a0']
  - anaconda==2018.12=py37_0 -> mkl-service==1.1.2=py37hb782905_5
  - anaconda==2018.12=py37_0 -> numexpr==2.6.8=py37hdce8814_0
  - shap
Use "conda info <package>" to see the dependencies for each package.

Anyone has any ideas what needs to be done to successfully install shap? I'm quite new to Python so any help would be appreciated.

Here are the dependencies:
